Elemental mercury from dental fillings is contaminating
the environment----it is the main source of mercury.
Some countries such as Sweden have banned mercury
amalgam fillings, mainly for this reason. They were banned in Russia and eastern bloc countries in 1960.
 Of course as this mercury is not safe in the environment it cannot be safe accumulating inside the
human brain and body.
 The Mercury Amalgam Industry claims that if you
have mercury amalgam fillings, the average patient
is exposed to no more mercury than from the food
that they eat.But the amount of mercury is actually 6
times more than they claim.

Some of the mercury in your food actually originates
from dental amalgam anyway! Most of the mercury
in food is ORGANIC and that from amalgam is
ELEMENTAL MERCURY VAPOR which is much more dangerous. The accumulation of elemental
mercury in some parts of the brain is 27 years, for
organic mercury 70 days.
So mercury amalgam must be banned asap.
